column7: is much slower than the green desert racer, due mainly to the heavier weight and larger tires I believe....but the motor that came with it did not seem quite as &quot

column12: We will see how many hundreds of pulls these motors were built for haha.&nbsp
column13: I like the look and performance of the desert racer better than the quad, but i do not regret the purchase.
